Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Kinzie
ShortDescription: #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Chicago, Cicero, Washington & Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Chicago, Cicero, Washington, then resume their normal route on Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Kinzie.

Allow extra travel time.
